alert.note: Alert for Western Uinta Basin (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 03 at 10:20PM MDT until April 06 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM MONDAY TO MIDNIGHT MDT TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 58 mph expected. * WHERE...Southwest Wyoming including I-80. In Utah, the Western Uinta Basin. * WHEN...From 3 PM Monday to midnight MDT Tuesday night/Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Crosswinds are expected along north to south oriented routes. Travel could be difficult especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall expected Tuesday morning through afternoon for southwest Wyoming could create slick spots on roadways and wintry conditions for backcountry recreation.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.
